name: ConneQTest
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, open the curtain”
”Alexa, is my door open”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Introducing ConneQ Test skill for Amazon Alexa. With our skill, you can easily control and monitor your devices connected to the ConneQ platform from anywhere, using only your voice.

Our skill supports a wide range of IoT devices, including smart lights, plugs, contact sensors and more. Want to turn off all the lights in your home? Simply say "Alexa, turn off the lights" and our skill will take care of the rest.

The current voice-control supported devices include:
1. Smart light bulb
2. Smart plug
3. Contact sensor
4. Water leak sensor

Prerequisites:
1. Create an account with ConneQ
2. Add the ConneQ devices to your ConneQ account
3. Open Alexa app, search "ConneQ" skill and enable it by signing in with the same ConneQ account.
4. Make sure that your ConneQ devices to a WiFi network
5. Speak to your Alexa Echo or Alexa APP

Example voice commands include:
1. Alexa, turn on the light
2. Alexa, open the curtain
3. Alexa, is my door open
4. Alexa, is there any water leakage
